channel.title: GraphQL Support on OWASP ZAP
channel.description: Recent content in GraphQL Support on OWASP ZAP

item.title: GraphQL Options
item.description: GraphQL Options In this document, a ‘Query’ may refer to a GraphQL query, subscription or mutation. Maximum Query Depth The maximum depth of a generated query. Maximum Arguments Depth The maximum depth of specified arguments. This is useful when a field has an input object as an argument.
